promo__title: Student project for the web development faculty
about__title_1: Graduation project consisted of five stages
about__subtitle_1: Setting a plan, creating backend, page layout, adding functionality and final fixes.
about__title_2: According to the plan there were five weeks to finish the project
about__subtitle_2: Each stage had a soft and hard deadline which needed to be kept in order to submit the project successfully
techs__subtitle: When studying on the faculty of web development we learned the following technologies that were used in the graduation project
profile__description: I was born in Ukraine and live in Israel, Haifa. I lke books, volunteering, music. Code. I have been working on pet projects since 2021. After completing a course in web development, I am started doing freelance jobs
